overview: Chinese citizen Master degree in Journalism, specialized in Advertisement. More than 13 years experience in the marketing (research) and media industry in China Served as the Director of Marketing & Management Centre in West China City Daily for 6 years. WCC Daily is the first successful commercial newspaper in China. Served as the Deputy Chief-editor of Life News Newspaper, set up the Advertisement Centre and Distribution Department. In charge of the day-to-day management of advertising and distribution, making Life News profitable and the no.2 newspaper in Yunnan province after 2 yearsâ€™ operation. Served as the Deputy General Manager (MT) of Sinomonitor International (Shanghai) marketing research company for 4 years. In charge of day-to-day management of the media and communication research. Joined i-merge in Dec. 2007, CEO China co-founder/owner of Holaba
